snippet.title: STEINS;GATE ELITE - Story Trailer | PS4, Nintendo Switch, & Steam (PC)
snippet.description:
ESRB: M

If you are already a STEINS;GATE fan, this trailer will make you feel nostalgic and ecstatic at the same time. Relive memories of thrills, laughs, and sorrows. If you haven’t stepped into the world of STEINS;GATE, check out the trailer and get ready to leap into an unforgettable story.

STEINS;GATE ELITE is available for digital pre-order today! Pre-purchase the Nintendo Switch™ version for a 10% discount. Pre-order the PlayStation®4 version to save 10% and get a PS4 theme.
 
Nintendo eShop: https://bit.ly/2sxYqu3

PlayStation™Store: https://bit.ly/2CsRL8Y

Official site: http://spike-chunsoft.com/SteinsGateElite
